channelParentsLinks.name: PlayStation™Now: 7-Day Trial
channelParentsLinks.description:
PlayStation Now is the subscription service that lets you stream hundreds of PS4 and PS3 games to your PS4 and Windows PC*. The 7-Day Free Trial lets you explore the entire PS Now catalog of over 500 games, including PlayStation exclusives, greatest hits, acclaimed masterpieces and games for the whole family. Visit PSNow.com to download the PC app or explore the full catalog of games.

* PC Minimum Requirements
• Windows 7 (SP 1), 8.1 or 10
• Core i3 2.0 GHz
• 300 MB
• 2 GB RAM
• Sound card; USB port

PlayStation Now games may lack some of the features of downloaded or disc-based games. For complete details, please visit https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/ps-now-legal-terms/.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: To use this free trial, you need a free Sony Entertainment Network account, PlayStation Now compatible device (including compatible Windows PC or PS4), a compatible DualShock®4 controller and a 5Mbs or greater broadband Internet connection. You also need to accept the PlayStation Network Terms of Service. Service availability and performance may vary by area or other factors.

PlayStation Now Subscription Terms
This 7-Day Free Trial gives you full access to the PlayStation Now game subscription catalog. At the end of the 7-day trial period, your PlayStation Now 1-Month Subscription will automatically begin and you will be billed $19.99 each month. You need a credit card or alternate payment method associated with your PlayStation Network account. If your wallet does not have enough funds to cover the subscription renewal, the system will bill you via your designated payment method. For the 1-Month Subscription, the automatic wallet top up setting in your PlayStation Network account will be turned “ON” to fund all purchases using the credit card or alternate payment method associated with your account, if applicable. In order to avoid automatic renewal of your 1-Month Subscription, you must cancel your subscription prior to the end of the 7-Day Free Trial period. PlayStation Now Subscription trial offers are valid for new subscribers only and may be redeemed only once per user and per account; additional redemptions and extensions are void.

Canceling from a PS4 System
Sign in to PlayStation Network, then go to [Settings] > [PlayStation Network] > [Account Information] > [Services List] > [PLAYSTATION™NOW SUBSCRIPTION]. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, select [Cancel Automatic Renewal].

Canceling from a Computer
Visit the link below, sign in to PlayStation Network, and then go to the Media section. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, cancel the automatic subscription renewal. https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com

The PlayStation Now 7-Day Trial is only available to U.S. residents and Canadian residents with a PlayStation Network account who are 18 years or older. High-speed broadband Internet service (5Mbs or greater) is required for download and access to certain content, features and benefits. Users are responsible for associated fees. Use of PSN℠ and PlayStation Now are subject to the PlayStation Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy. PSN and PlayStation Now subscription games, features and offerings are subject to change without notice, including but not limited to the removal of games from the subscription service.

channelParentsLinks.name: PlayStation™Now: 1-Month Subscription
channelParentsLinks.description:
PlayStation Now is the subscription service that lets you stream hundreds of PS4 and PS3 games to your PS4 and Windows PC*. The 1-Month Subscription lets you play the entire PS Now catalog of over 600 games, including PlayStation exclusives, greatest hits, acclaimed masterpieces and games for the whole family. Visit PSNow.com to download the PC app or explore the full catalog of games.

* PC Minimum Requirements
• Windows 7 (SP 1), 8.1 or 10
• Core i3 2.0 GHz
• 300 MB
• 2 GB RAM
• Sound card; USB port

PlayStation Now games may lack some of the features of downloaded or disc-based games. For complete details, please visit https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/ps-now-legal-terms/.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: To use this subscription, you need a free Sony Entertainment Network account, PlayStation Now compatible device (including compatible Windows PC or PS4), a compatible DualShock®4 controller and a 5Mbs or greater broadband Internet connection. You also need to accept the PlayStation Network Terms of Service. Service availability and performance may vary by area or other factors.

PlayStation Now Subscription Terms
This 1-Month Subscription gives you full access to the PlayStation Now game subscription catalog. At the end of the 1-month subscription period, your subscription will automatically renew for an additional month at a price of $19.99. You need a credit card or alternate payment method associated with your PlayStation Network account. If your wallet does not have enough funds to cover the subscription renewal, the system will bill you via your designated payment method.

When you purchase this 1-Month Subscription, the automatic wallet top up setting in your PlayStation Network account will be turned “ON” to fund all purchases using the credit card or alternate payment method associated with your account, if applicable. In order to avoid automatic renewal of your 1-Month Subscription, you must cancel your subscription prior to the end of the original 1-month subscription period.

Canceling from a PS4 System
Sign in to PlayStation Network, then go to [Settings] > [PlayStation Network] > [Account Information] > [Services List] > [PLAYSTATION™NOW SUBSCRIPTION]. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, select [Cancel Automatic Renewal].

Canceling from a Computer
Visit the link below, sign in to PlayStation Network, and then go to the Media section. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, cancel the automatic subscription renewal. https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com

The PlayStation Now game streaming subscription is only available to U.S. residents and Canadian residents with a PlayStation Network account who are 18 years or older. High-speed broadband Internet service (5Mbs or greater) is required for download and access to certain content, features and benefits. Users are responsible for associated fees. Use of PSN℠ and PlayStation Now are subject to the PlayStation Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy.

PSN and PlayStation Now subscription games, features and offerings are subject to change without notice, including but not limited to the removal of games from the subscription service.

Sign in to PlayStation Network, then go to [Settings] > [PlayStation Network] > [Account Information] > [Services List] > [PLAYSTATION™NOW SUBSCRIPTION]. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, select [Cancel Automatic Renewal].

Canceling from a Computer
Visit the link below, sign in to PlayStation Network, and then go to the Media section. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, cancel the automatic subscription renewal. https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com

The PlayStation Now game streaming subscription is only available to U.S. residents and Canadian residents with a PlayStation Network account who are 18 years or older. High-speed broadband Internet service (5Mbs or greater) is required for download and access to certain content, features and benefits. Users are responsible for associated fees. Use of PSN℠ and PlayStation Now are subject to the PlayStation Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy.

PSN and PlayStation Now subscription games, features and offerings are subject to change without notice, including but not limited to the removal of games from the subscription service.

channelParentsLinks.name: PlayStation™Now: 3-Month Subscription
channelParentsLinks.description:
PlayStation Now is the subscription service that lets you stream hundreds of PS4 and PS3 games to your PS4 and Windows PC*. The 3-Month Subscription lets you play the entire PS Now catalog of over 600 games, including PlayStation exclusives, greatest hits, acclaimed masterpieces and games for the whole family. Visit PSNow.com to download the PC app or explore the full catalog of games.

* PC Minimum Requirements
• Windows 7 (SP 1), 8.1 or 10
• Core i3 2.0 GHz
• 300 MB
• 2 GB RAM
• Sound card; USB port

PlayStation Now games may lack some of the features of downloaded or disc-based games. For complete details, please visit https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/ps-now-legal-terms/.

IMPORTANT NOTICE: To use this subscription, you need a free Sony Entertainment Network account, PlayStation Now compatible device (including compatible Windows PC or PS4), a compatible DualShock®4 controller and a 5Mbs or greater broadband Internet connection. You also need to accept the PlayStation Network Terms of Service. Service availability and performance may vary by area or other factors.

PlayStation Now Subscription Terms
This 3-Month Subscription gives you full access to the PlayStation Now game subscription catalog for 3 months. At the end of the 3-month subscription period, your subscription will automatically renew for an additional 3 months at a price of $44.99. You need a credit card or alternate payment method associated with your PlayStation Network account. If your wallet does not have enough funds to cover the subscription renewal, the system will bill you via your designated payment method. When you purchase this 3-Month Subscription, the automatic wallet top up setting in your PlayStation Network account will be turned “ON” to fund all purchases using the credit card or alternate payment method associated with your account, if applicable. In order to avoid automatic renewal of your 3-Month Subscription, you must cancel your subscription prior to the end of the original 3-month subscription period.

Canceling from a PS4 System
Sign in to PlayStation Network, then go to [Settings] > [PlayStation Network] > [Account Information] > [Services List] > [PLAYSTATION™NOW SUBSCRIPTION]. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, select [Cancel Automatic Renewal].

Canceling from a Computer
Visit the link below, sign in to PlayStation Network, and then go to the Media section. After selecting the subscription you want to cancel, cancel the automatic subscription renewal. https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com

The PlayStation Now game streaming subscription is only available to U.S. residents and Canadian residents with a PlayStation Network account who are 18 years or older. High-speed broadband Internet service (5Mbs or greater) is required for download and access to certain content, features and benefits. Users are responsible for associated fees. Use of PSN℠ and PlayStation Now are subject to the PlayStation Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy.

PSN and PlayStation Now subscription games, features and offerings are subject to change without notice, including but not limited to the removal of games from the subscription service.
